# lavinmq_federation_upstream_set (Resource)

Manage a federation upstream set for high availability federation configurations.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the federation upstream set.
- `upstreams` (List of String) List of upstream names that belong to this set.
- `vhost` (String) Virtual host where the federation upstream set is defined.
